In addition to CBT, Psycortex integrates other evidence-based modalities such as mindfulness-based therapies, dialectical behavior therapy (DBT), and acceptance and commitment therapy (ACT) into their counseling sessions. These approaches help clients cultivate greater self-awareness, emotional regulation, and resilience in the face of life's challenges.
mentalhealthcounselling.p13: As such, their counseling services often incorporate a holistic approach that addresses not only the symptoms of mental illness but also the underlying root causes and contributing factors. Psycortex also offers specialized counseling programs tailored to specific populations, such as children and adolescents, couples, and LGBTQ+ individuals. These programs provide targeted interventions and support tailored to the unique needs and experiences of each group, promoting inclusivity and cultural sensitivity in mental health care delivery.Furthermore, Psycortex recognizes the interconnectedness of mental health with other aspects of one's life, such as relationships, work, and lifestyle factors.
mentalhealthcounselling.p21: Moreover, Psycortex places a strong emphasis on ongoing education and empowerment, equipping clients with the knowledge, skills, and resources they need to maintain their mental well-being beyond the counseling sessions. This may include psychoeducation on stress management techniques, relaxation exercises, and strategies for building healthy coping mechanisms.
mentalhealthcounselling.p22: Clients are encouraged to actively participate in their treatment journey and collaborate with their therapists to set achievable goals and monitor progress. By taking an active role in their mental health care, clients develop a sense of agency and ownership over their well-being, leading to greater empowerment and self-efficacy.
